reasoning: The test looked for 'blog author activity monitoring' functionality that was never implemented in the product. The Blogs Module Analytics dashboard is designed for content-level aggregate metrics (blog view rates, comment rates, engagement trends), not individual author statistics. No error or broken functionality exists - the UI is working as designed.
evidence_summary: Screenshot shows a functioning Blogs analytics dashboard with aggregate content metrics (blogs older than 6 hours with no views, blogs older than 24 hours without comments, blogs with deleted comments) and an engagement timeline chart. No author-specific analytics section exists, and the dashboard operates correctly for its intended purpose of content-level analytics.
scenario_id: Evoq.PersonaBar.CommunityAnalytics::Blogs Module Analytics::Monitor blog author activity
